nodes.text: Lexei was an individual who held the rank of general in the Rebel Alliance. The pilot Nath Tensent led his squadron in the Battle at Trenchenovu on the Galactic Empire's Trenchenovu shipyards, six months prior to the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, in order to earn a favor from Lexei to pick his next mission. Tensent's squadron was defeated during the attack and Tensent, being the only survivor, recounted the story of the mission to Lieutenant Yrica Quell several weeks after the Battle of Endor, mentioning Lexei.
Lexei was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
